segments.text: What is your long-term goal in this career ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My long-term goal is to become an expert in this field .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What would you do to achieve that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In order to achieve that objective . I would work step by step and make further study .
segments.speaker: S2
